details: The script utilizes the SLURM workload manager to submit and manage a job.  It defines various SLURM parameters like job name, working directory, job queue, number of tasks and/or nodes, GPU resources, runtime, and memory requirements. It also sets an environment variable ENV_JOB_ID to the SLURM job ID.  The script uses Jinja templating to dynamically insert values like job name, workspace, queue, number of cores, nodes, GPUs, runtime, and memory based on input parameters.
